languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, вас хотят видеть члены вашей свиты..." {n}Голос Мастера вокса звучит напряженно и даже слегка испуганно.{/n} "И мне кажется, они не примут отказа в аудиенции".
"Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they will not accept a refusal."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, вас хотят видеть члены вашей свиты..." {n}Голос Мастера вокса звучит напряженно и даже слегка испуганно.{/n} "И мне кажется, они не примут отказа в аудиенции".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they won't accept a refusal."
"Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they won't accept a refusal."
"Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they will not accept a refusal."
"Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they will not accept a refusal."
"Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they will not accept a refusal."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、随行者たちがあなたを呼んでいます…」{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声は緊迫しており、恐れているようにも聞こえる。{/n}「拒否することは受け入れられないと思われます」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they will not accept a refusal."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、随行者たちがあなたを呼んでいます…」{n}ヴォクス・マスターの声は緊迫しており、恐れているようにも聞こえる。{/n}「拒否することは受け入れられないと思われます」

languages.text: “舰长大人，您的随行人员需要您在场……”{n}音阵大师的声音听起来很紧张，似乎还有些害怕。{/n}“如果您不来，恐怕他们是不会接受的。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they will not accept a refusal."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您的随行人员需要您在场……”{n}音阵大师的声音听起来很紧张，似乎还有些害怕。{/n}“如果您不来，恐怕他们是不会接受的。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, des membres de votre entourage vous réclament... » {n}La voix de la maîtresse-vox est tendue, voire quelque peu effrayée.{/n} « Et je doute fort qu'ils se contentent d'un refus. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they will not accept a refusal."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, des membres de votre entourage vous réclament... » {n}La voix de la maîtresse-vox est tendue, voire quelque peu effrayée.{/n} « Et je doute fort qu'ils se contentent d'un refus. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, varios miembros de su séquito requieren su presencia...». {n}La maestra de vocos suena tensa, incluso asustada.{/n} «Me temo que no aceptarán un "no" por respuesta».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they will not accept a refusal."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, varios miembros de su séquito requieren su presencia...». {n}La maestra de vocos suena tensa, incluso asustada.{/n} «Me temo que no aceptarán un "no" por respuesta».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Mitglieder Eures Gefolges ersuchen um Eure Anwesenheit ..." {n}Die Stimme der Voxmeisterin klingt angespannt, beinahe verängstigt.{/n} "Und ich glaube nicht, dass sie eine Weigerung akzeptieren würden."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they will not accept a refusal."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Mitglieder Eures Gefolges ersuchen um Eure Anwesenheit ..." {n}Die Stimme der Voxmeisterin klingt angespannt, beinahe verängstigt.{/n} "Und ich glaube nicht, dass sie eine Weigerung akzeptieren würden."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, maiyetinizin sizi bekliyor..." {n}Voks Üstadı'nın sesinde gerginlik, hatta bir miktar korku seziliyor.{/n} "İsteklerini geri çevirmenizi de kabul etmeyecek gibiler."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your presence is required by members of your retinue..." {n}The Vox Master's voice sounds tense, even somewhat frightened.{/n} "And I believe that they will not accept a refusal."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, maiyetinizin üyeleri sizi bekliyorlar..." {n}Voks Üstadı'nın sesinde gerginlik, hatta bir miktar korku seziliyor.{/n} "İsteklerini geri çevirmenizi de kabul etmeyecek gibiler."
